languages.text: "Не знаю, о ком это ты, но обещаю — я с радостью помогу залить в него "чашу страданий"".

traits.locale_text: "Не знаю, о ком это ты, но обещаю — я с радостью помогу залить в него 'чашу страданий'".

languages.text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."
languages.original_text: "Не знаю, о ком это ты, но обещаю — я с радостью помогу залить в него "чашу страданий"".

traits.locale_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."
"I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."
"I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."
"I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

languages.text: 「誰のことを言っているのかは知らないが、奴らに苦渋をなめさせてやれるなら喜んで手を貸そう」
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: 「誰のことを言っているのかは知らないが、奴らに苦渋をなめさせてやれるなら喜んで手を貸そう」

languages.text: “我不知道你说的是谁，但我保证，我很乐意帮你把‘苦难之杯’里的玩意倒进那家伙的喉咙。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道你说的是谁，但我保证，我很乐意帮你把‘苦难之杯’里的玩意倒进那家伙的喉咙。”

languages.text: «No sé de quién hablas, pero te prometo que te ayudaré con sumo gusto a verterle ese "cáliz de sufrimiento" por la garganta».
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: «No sé de quién hablas, pero te prometo que te ayudaré con sumo gusto a verterle ese "cáliz de sufrimiento" por la garganta».

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, von wem Ihr sprecht, aber ich verspreche, Euch gerne dabei zu helfen, wenn Ihr den 'Becher der Qual' seine Kehle hinabschüttet."
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, von wem Ihr sprecht, aber ich verspreche, Euch gerne dabei zu helfen, wenn Ihr den 'Becher der Qual' seine Kehle hinabschüttet."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas de qui vous parlez, mais je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider à lui verser cette "coupe de la souffrance" au fond du gosier. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas de qui vous parlez, mais je me ferai un plaisir de vous aider à lui verser cette "coupe de la souffrance" au fond du gosier. »

languages.text: "Bahsettiğin kişiyi tanımıyorum ama sana söz, 'kan kusturma' konusunda seve seve yardım ederim."
languages.original_text: "I don't know who you're talking about, but I promise I'll gladly help you pour the 'cup of suffering' down their throat."

traits.locale_text: "Bahsettiğin kişiyi tanımıyorum ama sana söz, 'kan kusturma' konusunda seve seve yardım ederim."
